prompt:

Patient: Yeah. I was asking you about the fluid

Nurse: I

responses.gpt4: I understand your concern, Mr. Delarosa. Managing a low-sodium diet can indeed be challenging, but it is crucial in managing your conditions. Would you like some guidance or tips on how to make it more manageable?
responses.our_model: I understand, I understand your frustration, Mr. Delarosa. Monitoring fluid intake can be challenging. However, it's an important part of managing your CHF. Would it be okay if I shared some tips on how to manage your fluid intake?
